thread.section_title: Artfinder Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Artfinder | artfinder.com
thread.title: Duane Engelhardt

author: Duane Engelhardt
title: Duane Engelhardt
text: Everything went well. I received the package and cautiously unwrapped the sculpture, wrapped securely in several layers of foam and bubble wrap. It was very exciting like discovering some hidden treasure. The piece is more than I expected. I had no problems with the order, delivery or how the work was represented online versus what I can now hold in my hands.
